Parameters: @B_java#time#ZonedDateTime_E@
ZonedDateTime: The exact time at which the plan starts.
@B_java#time#Period_E@
Period: The period after which the plan automatically recurs.
createRecurring(java.time.ZonedDateTime,.Description: Start defining a @B_android#telephony#SubscriptionPlan_E@ that starts at a specific time, and automatically recurs after each specific period of time, repeating indefinitely. When the given period is set to exactly one month, the plan will always recur on the day of the month defined by @B_java#time#ZonedDateTime#getDayOfMonth_E@. When a particular month ends before this day, the plan will recur on the last possible instant of that month.
createRecurring(java.time.ZonedDateTime,.FullName: public static SubscriptionPlan.Builder createRecurring (ZonedDateTime start, Period period)
